Text:
Though this says 1:43:15 minutes, it is actually 109 mins - a shame, as this stretching means I can't match it up with the 5.1 audio from a DVD, or any other BDrips available online.
Can't simply change the bitrate before muxing, as it looks like the stretch was uneven. So it may match up in some places, but not in others. 

Therefore, unfortunately this particular torrent is not recommended. Thanks for the effort, though uploader.
